#Instructions on installing the W3C python test tool for Windows



= Details =
First, install python from http://www.python.org/
  * Extract to `c:\python25\`
  * Add `c:\python25\` to your path (My Computer -> Properties -> Advanced -> Environment Variables)

Second, follow these <a href="http://boodebr.org/main/python/build-windows-extensions">steps</a>

Third, get <a href="http://rdflib.net/">rdflib</a>.
  * Extract to `c:\rdflib`
  * From the command line, run `python setup install`
  * Repeat if prompted

Fourth, get the <a href="http://www.w3.org/TR/grddl-tests/#deliverables">grddl-tests</a> zip file
 * Extract somewhere useful

= See also =
http://www.w3.org/TR/grddl-tests/#testft
